com.tomeraberbach.mano.assembly

Class Compiler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tomeraberbach.mano.assembly.Compiler

  • public class Compiler
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing a compiler which compiles assembly code for Mano's computer as detailed in:
    Computer System Architecture, 3rd edition
    By M. Morris Mano
    Published by Prentice-Hall, c 1993
    Chapter 5, pp 123-172.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int address
      The current address this Compiler is at.
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> errors
      The ArrayList of errors encountered when attempting to compile this source.
      private java.util.ArrayList<Instruction> instructions
      The ArrayList of Instruction instances which were compiled from this source.
      private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Label> labelMap
      Map which maps assembly label lexemes to their respective Label instances.
      private java.lang.String source
      The assembly source code to compile.
      private int start
      The address where the program in this source starts.
      private Token token
      The current Token this Compiler has parsed.
      private java.util.ArrayDeque<Token> tokens
      The ArrayDeque of Token instances acquired from tokenizing this source.

      private void generate()
      Interprets Token instances created by tokenize(): Maps instructions to their respective codes (see Instruction.MEMORY_REFERENCE_INSTRUCTIONS and Instruction.IMPLICIT_REFERENCE_INSTRUCTIONS. Interprets directives. Parses decimal and hexadecimal numbers literals. Collects labelMap in preparation for calling replaceLabels(ArrayList). Instruction instances generated will be added to instructions.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Compiler

        private Compiler(java.lang.String source)
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • compile

        public static Program compile(java.lang.String source)
        Parameters:
        source - The assembly source code to compile.
        Returns:
        Program which is the result of compiling this source.

      • compile

        private Program compile()
        Returns:
        Program which is the result of compiling this source.

      • tokenize

        private void tokenize()
        Splits this source by line, removes comments, pads commas, and then splits by whitespace. The resulting String instances in the final split will be converted to Token instances and added to this tokens.

      • generate

        private void generate()
        Interprets Token instances created by tokenize():
        • Maps instructions to their respective codes (see Instruction.MEMORY_REFERENCE_INSTRUCTIONS and Instruction.IMPLICIT_REFERENCE_INSTRUCTIONS.
        • Interprets directives.
        • Parses decimal and hexadecimal numbers literals.
        • Collects labelMap in preparation for calling replaceLabels(ArrayList).
        Instruction instances generated will be added to instructions. All errors are logged as String instances in errors.

      • isLabel

        private boolean isLabel()
        Returns:
        boolean representing if the current Token (token) is a Label.

      • label

        private void label()
        Treats the current Token (token) as a Label and logs it in labelMap.

      • org

        private void org(boolean start)
        Interprets an ORG directive by parsing its number argument and changing the current address (address).

      • get12BitNumber

        private static int get12BitNumber(java.lang.String lexeme,
                                  int range)
        Parameters:
        lexeme - String representing a number to parse.
        range - The inclusive upper bound to which the parsed number has to conform.
        Returns:
        -1 if lexeme is not a number or not on the interval [0, range], the integer represented by lexeme otherwise.

      • replaceLabels

        private void replaceLabels(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> labels)
        Replaces any labelMap found after calling generate() with their hex values in their respective Instruction instances in instructions using labelMap.
        Parameters:
        labels - ArrayList of String labelMap to replace using labelMap.
